#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define For(i, be, en) for(i = be; i <= en; i++)
#define Forr(i, be, en) for(int i = be; i >= en; i--)

using namespace std;

struct edge {
    int to;
    int w;
};

int main()
{
    int t, n, m, s, p, q, c;
    int vc;
    int rc;

    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        //cin >> u >> v >> k;
        //g[u].push_back(v, k);
        cin >> n >> m >> s >> p >> q;

        c = 0;
        vc = 1;
        rc = 1;
        for (int i = 1; i <= s; i++) {
            vc = (vc + p);
            rc = (rc + q);

            while (vc > n) {
                vc = m + vc - n - 1;
            }

            while (rc > n) {
                rc = m + rc - n - 1;
            }
            //cout << vc << " " << rc << endl;

            if (vc == rc) {
                c++;
            }

        }

        cout << c << "\n";
    }
	return 0;
}
